name: Employee Creator
description: Employee Creator is a _Nology project. This is a full stack app where you can perform CRUD operations.

name: Draw Creator
description: Front End project that I built to make a randomiser for a potential sports draw.

name: Google Books
description: Google Books is a _Nology project, using Google's API. It contains a basic search bar, and will render your results.

name: E-Commerce Store
description: E-Commerce store is a _Nology project. Using Firebase's Firestore as a backend to render products. There is a Favourited section and a Cart.

name: Fake OS
description: Fake OS is a _Nology project, we had to create our operating system(Win 11), with atleast 3 desktop icons that open a widget, and a menu button. There is also a the time and date constantly showing on the taskbar.

name: Morse Translator
description: Morse Translator is a _Nology project. Basically it will turn Enlgish into Morse Code, and vice versa.

name: Minesweeper
description: Minesweeper is a _Nology project. Using Java, re-create the game to be played on the Command Line.

name: CEN
description: CEN is a project I built for a friend, he runs a poker competition. There are few parts missing from the version you're looking at due to privacy.
